# elasticsearch-store

<!-- THIS FILE IS AUTO-GENERATED, EDIT docs/packages/elasticsearch-store/overview.md INSTEAD -->

**NOTE:** This a package within the [Teraslice](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice) monorepo, more documentation can be found [here](https://terascope.github.io/teraslice/docs/).

> An API for managing an elasticsearch index, with versioning and migration support.

# Installation

```bash
# Using yarn
yarn add elasticsearch-store
# Using npm
npm install --save elasticsearch-store
```

Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.

Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.
